issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The command in MAPREDUCE-3124 run and this job got hung with 1 Map task waiting for resources and 7 Reducers running (2 waiting).  The mapper got scheduler, then AM scheduled the reducers, the map task failed and tried to start a new attempt but reducers were using all the slots.   

I will try to add some more info from the logs.
fields.summary: mr job stuck because reducers using all slots and mapper isn't scheduled

comments.body:
Thomas, could glean anything from the logs?

Also, can you check if any NM was 'lost' i.e. crashed - there is corner-case with headroom calculations when cluster-capacity changes, I'm wondering if that was the cause here?
Sorry, haven't got back to this but have the logs saved off, will look later today.
I didn't see any reference to lost/removed nodes in the RM log. Looking at the other logs to see if I can get anymore useful info on this.
I'll fix the CS corner case at least with this jira...
Patch to fix corner case in CS.

+1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12498563/MAPREDUCE-3126.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 6 new or modified tests.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/984//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/984//console

This message is automatically generated.

    MAPREDUCE-3126. Fixed a corner case in CapacityScheduler where headroom wasn't updated on changes to cluster size.
